Description: Fragment of foot of Attic black-glazed, stamped pottery bowl. Wholly glazed; eight linked palmettes and rouletting on floor. Groove on resting surface. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 605)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1862)
